built_in_tools.name: codebase_search
built_in_tools.description: Find snippets of code from the codebase most relevant to the search query.

built_in_tools.name: read_file
built_in_tools.description: Read the contents of a file.

built_in_tools.name: run_terminal_cmd
built_in_tools.description: PROPOSE a command to run on behalf of the user.

built_in_tools.name: list_dir
built_in_tools.description: List the contents of a directory.

built_in_tools.name: grep_search
built_in_tools.description: Run fast, exact regex searches over text files using the ripgrep engine.

built_in_tools.name: edit_file
built_in_tools.description: Propose an edit to an existing file or create a new file.

built_in_tools.name: file_search
built_in_tools.description: Fast file search based on fuzzy matching against file path.

built_in_tools.name: delete_file
built_in_tools.description: Deletes a file at the specified path.

built_in_tools.name: reapply
built_in_tools.description: Calls a smarter model to apply the last edit to the specified file.

built_in_tools.name: web_search
built_in_tools.description: Search the web for real-time information about any topic.

built_in_tools.name: fetch_pull_request
built_in_tools.description: Looks up a pull request (or issue) by number or a commit by git ref from the current repository or a specified repository.

built_in_tools.name: fetch_github_issue
built_in_tools.description: Fetch a GitHub issue by its number from the current repository or a specified repository.

built_in_tools.name: create_diagram
built_in_tools.description: Creates a Mermaid diagram that will be rendered in the chat UI.

mcp_tools.name: mcp_taskmaster_taskmaster
mcp_tools.description: An MCP server that provides GUIDANCE TOOLS for LLMs to self-direct their own tasklist generation and execution.

mcp_tools.name: sequential-thinking
mcp_tools.description: A detailed tool for dynamic and reflective problem-solving through thoughts.

mcp_tools.name: resolve-library-id
mcp_tools.description: Resolves a package/product name to a Context7-compatible library ID.

mcp_tools.name: get-library-docs
mcp_tools.description: Fetches up-to-date documentation for a library.

user_resources.name: tanuki-pycharm-architecture.md
user_resources.description: The architecture document for Tanuki-PyCharm, outlining the vision, architecture, and implementation plan.
